rows: A football team scored 3 goals in the first half. Then they scored more goals in the second half. They won the game with 5 goals! How many goals did they socre in the second half?
Peter has 4 marbles. Sue gives Peter some marbles and now he has 6 marbles in all. How many marbles did Sue give Peter?
George went to a store and bought some t-shirts. He went to another store and bought 2 more t-shirts. He bought a total of 7 t-shirts. How many t-shirts did he buy at the first store?
Peter read 6 pages of his book before lunch. After lunch he read some more. If Peter read 9 pages in all, how many pages did he read after lunch?
There are some crickets in a jar. You collect 5 more crickets and now have 10 crickets in all. How many crickets did you start with?
